ERROR.GENERIC_IMPORT_ERROR: Unknown error while importing accounts from backup
ERROR.INVALID_PASSWORD: The provided password could not decrypt the accounts. The import was unsuccessful.
ERROR.NO_ACCOUNTS_SELECTED_TO_EXPORT: You must select at least one account to export
ERROR.NO_PASSWORD_PROVIDED: A password is required to decrypt the accounts

ACCOUNT_SYNC.EXPORT_ENCRYPTED_ACCOUNTS:
Encryption is enabled, but you can choose to export the accounts either encrypted or unencrypted.

Would you like to export them encrypted or unencrypted?

ERROR_MSGS.ERROR_CAMERA_MESSAGE:
Camera access is required to scan QR codes, but it seems your device either lacks a camera or camera permissions were denied.

Please check your device/permissions settings and try again.

CRYPTO_API_NOT_SUPPORTED: Crypto API not supported by the browser

ASK_PASSWORD.MESSAGE:
The accounts are encrypted.

Please enter the decryption password.

HOME.CONFIRM_LOGOUT_MESSAGE:
All local or unsynchronized accounts will be deleted!

This action cannot be undone.
HOME.CONFIRM_LOGOUT_TITLE: Are you sure you want to sign out?
HOME.CONFIRM_LOGOUT_YES: CLEAR LOCAL DATA AND SIGN OUT

ERRORS.ACCOUNTS_LOCKED: Your accounts are encrypted. You won't be able to view the codes until they are decrypted using the encryption password.
ERRORS.PASSWORD_NOT_SET:
A password was not set.

Encryption feature will be deactivted.

HOME.PASSWORD_PROMPT_MESSAGE: In order to use the encryption feature, please enter a password

PASSWORD_RECOVERY_ALERT.MESSAGE:
It's important to periodic check and remember your password. 
If you forget it you'll not be able to decrypt the accounts for use in another devices.
PASSWORD_RECOVERY_ALERT.TITLE: Warning

PERIODIC_CHECK.MESSAGE: Enter your password again for confirmation

MISMATCH.MESSAGE:
The encryption password doesn't match the entered password

The application will continue to work normally, but if you don't remember the password, then you'll not be able to import the encrypted accounts to another device
MISMATCH.TITLE: The password doesn't match

PERIODIC_CHECK.TITLE: Password Confirmation

ERROR_MSGS.DEFAULT_ERROR: Could not sign in, check the credentials and try again
ERROR_MSGS.TOO_MANY_ATTEMPTS_TRY_LATER: Too many attempts. Try again after 15 minutes

UPDATER.UPDATE_AVAILABLE_BODY: A new version of the app is available and will be installed automatically to get the latest features and bug fixes.
